name: Nimsay PB
text: The restaurant was cleaned. The staff was very polite and friendly. Good overall. Pizza was very good.

name: Wanda Strickland
text: This is the worst Pizza Hut I have ever been to. Order was extremely slow and was not even correct. They did not even offer to correct.

name: Misti Hartman
text: Customer service was pleasant, patient, and speedy. Order was done correctly and in a timely manner.

name: Kim Evans
text:
This was one of the best pizzas I've had. First time ordering from this location and gentleman who took the order over the phone
was friendly and had our pizza ready before the time given for pickup. It was the perfect amount of toppings, piping hot, and very tasty! Will definitely be back!!

name: Nick & Lauren Ross
text: There were not many customers. Service was horribly slow. It took close to 30 mins. before we received our appetizer of bread sticks. When we did get them they were cold. We requested the channel on the television be changed because it was …More

name: Jared Frost
text: Clean, good service typical Pizza Hut food.

name: Charlie Hawkins
text: Nice people and good food

name: Megan Yoder
text: It's Pizza Hut. Of course it's good

name: kevin thorp
text: Service was a little slow for us being the only ones in there. Salad bar wasn't stocked very well.

name: Amber Horton
text: We went tonight and I'm not sure what was going on. At first they were out of Pzones, then out of meatballs. Our less than friendly waitress then brought us what we managed to order less the chicken caesar salad. When we inquired about …More

name: Christy Parker
text: Great place to stop. Clean and newly remodeled.  The food was hot ( that alone is amazing! )...and good. The salad bar was loaded up and fresh.  The waitress was courteous and did a good job waiting on us.  I would recommend Monroe City Pizza Hut.

name: Gerald Byars
text: It was great service and good food.

name: Angela Johnson
text: Pizza was awesome! Sarah did a great job waiting on us!!!

name: Triple Air Tarot
text: This place.....it's pretty sad that in the small town of Monroe City, Mo that people would rather get their pizza from Casey's gas station than from Pizza Hut. They didn't want to unthaw the sauce to make a Taco pizza....so, we left that Eeyore of a waitress and that Pizza Hut....and got excellent pizza at Casey's!!

name: The Evans Family
text: The food is always a 10/10, and waitresses are super nice, and if you do any thing but the $5 deal you are spending alot of money. That's the only thing I can think of being a negative. Is some of the price points are alittle high, but always delicious.

name: Ryan Rechtien
text: We got a stuffed crust pizza here and when we looked at it it was not fully cooked. Went back into restaurant and the staff mad another one but it still wasn't cooked right. No refund or apology was given.

name: adencoolfight couch
text: Its good pizza but it is not my kind of pizza.

name: Tabatha Corey
text: Service was very poor. Forgot one person's drink, had to go to counter to get a refill.

name: sherry flowers
text: Zoeie was wonderful!

name: Joshua McVeigh
text: Very nice Pizza hut. Great service.

name: Andrew Coon
text: Clean, good service.

name: Patricia Wheeler
text: Excellent today, great service and the pizza was prrfect

name: Wally Greer
text: Clean, good staff. Careful of turning into parking lot.

name: brandon pittman
text: Nice pizza hut clean very nice waitresses and good salad. Great deal on large pizza

name: Jenny Webb
text: $5 Lineup choices are great way to eat cheaply!

name: Gerald Wilson
text: Service and food were good. Corporate prices are too high for small town America. Gerald.

name: John Buffington
text: Nice sit down place

name: Janet Hamilton
text: All employees were very nice and very helpful !

name: Lisa Countryman
text: Luv the meal deal.wish they had traditional wings!!!

name: Amy Niffen
text: Great food, clean establishment,  and good service!

name: Diane Szarek
text: Had to call the store while seated at a booth for refill.  The pizza was so greasy we used 1/2 roll of paper towels to soak up the grease.  Our 12 pcs wing order was 11 pcs as 1 was so burnt you couldn't eat it.  We spoke with owner and he paid for our meal however we will never be back.

name: Kevin Hovde
text: The Pizza Hut was clean and very fast making our food.

name: Jody Pulis
text: The staff was amazing food was so good

name: Jackie Holt
text: Dani is a great waitress and always takes great care of our family of 5 every Rhine we come in.

name: Lacy Cahalin
text: I came here with my family for lunch after church on Sunday. There is a HUGE television and there was pornography showing on the television.  All the families with children were highly upset. I plan to contact corporate with a formal complaint.

name: Jim Dinsmore
text: It was clean and the food was good & hot. The service was courteous.

name: Panda Gamer 420
text: Excellent service but busy as hell

name: dakota mccloud
text: They over charged me and my family and just kept telling us we were wrong, the waitress was amazing but the "manager" was rude and talked about us as we were walking out the door

name: Verna Detmer
text: Good food and fast.   Salad bar is great.

name: Alexandre Carneiro
text: Great pizza, great deals 2 medium specialty for 6.99 each

name: Raeschl Dabney
text: Understaffed and pizza was overcooked

name: william ball
text: Great quality food and clean warming building

name: alex nobles
text: A little greasy

name: Paul Washington
text: It was very pleasant to be there with my family and friends

name: David Withem
text: Americas favorite pizza now for $5.99 one topping buy two or more.  That's gotta make you smile.

name: Todd Arp
text: Sucks, service & cold food!  Won't be back!

name: Dean Winchester
text: Small meat lovers pizza, small breadsticks and a pop $21.56!!!!!!! Most expensive I have ever paid for a paper thin pizza WOW! Never go back
